comments.body: This is getting long enough that maybe we should be using a record (parameter pack) here?
Yeah good idea, Iâ€™ll see if I can refactor it sometime soonish.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +109,113 @@    opts <- fmap (\opts -> opts{optHaddock=Haddock True}) $ defaultOptionsIO Nothing
    vfs <- makeVFSHandle
    ideState <- initialise mainRule (pure $ LSP.IdInt 0) (const $ pure ()) noLogging (toCompileOpts opts (IdeReportProgress False)) vfs
    Just pm <- runAction ideState $ use GetParsedModule $ toNormalizedFilePath tmpFile
    genModuleContent (getDocTestModule pm) @?= T.unlines (doctestHeader <> expected)
